alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:31PM MST until July 27 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MST FOR EAST CENTRAL LA PAZ COUNTY... At 431 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vicksburg Junction, or 43 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salome, Vicksburg, Brenda, Vicksburg Junction, and Harcuvar. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 32 and 58. US Highway 60 between mile markers 32 and 56. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 41 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
